extensionDescription.message: HTTP Header Spy enables you to inspect request- response headers and cookies right after page load with no extra clicks.

aboutPageContent.message: My name is Michiel Roos. I had a lot of fun developing this add-on. I also learnt a lot. I hope you find it usefull and enjoy using it. If you have any suggetstions or constructive criticism, please contact me.
